title: Ordering Food Confidently
objectives: Learn polite English phrases for ordering food and drinks
Practice real-life dialogues with cafe staff
Use short questions to confirm prices, requests, or modifications
Gain confidence to handle any quick-service scenario

activities.text: नमस्ते! आज हम सीखेंगे कि English में food order करते समय क्या कहना चाहिए, और इस बार हम इस्तेमाल करेंगे आसान 5-Step Toolkit. आज की कहानी में Neha पहली बार कैफ़े जा रही है. चलिए, हम भी उसके साथ सीखते हैं!

activities.title: Neha की कहानी
activities.body: Neha एक college student है जो English में confidently order करना सीखना चाहती है. उसे थोड़ी घबराहट है, लेकिन वो कोशिश करना चाहती है. चलिए, हम उसकी मदद करते हैं – ताकि वो politely और clearly बोल सके!

activities.title: 5-Step Toolkit
activities.text:
जब भी आप कुछ order करने जाएँ, ये पाँच स्टेप्स याद रखिए:
1) Greet: 'Excuse me...' या 'Hello!'
2) Order: 'I’d like...' या 'Could I have...'
3) Respond: कुछ और चाहिए या नहीं?
4) Clarify/Modify: 'Actually, could I change...?'
5) Confirm & Pay: 'How much is it?' + 'Thank you!'

इन्हें follow करने से आपकी ordering smooth रहेगी!

cards.definition: ‘Excuse me... Hello!’ – स्टाफ को politely address करें। (Step 1)
‘I’d like a coffee, please.’ – अपनी wish बताएं। (Step 2)
‘No, that’s all. Thank you.’ – कुछ और नहीं चाहिए तो कहें। (Step 3)
‘Could I change my order?’ – कुछ बदलना हो तो politely पूछें। (Step 4)
‘How much is it?’ – कीमत पूछकर ‘Thank you’ कहें। (Step 5)

activities.title: Polite Staff Questions
activities.text:
Staff अक्सर पूछ सकता है:
• ‘What would you like?’
• ‘Anything else?’
• ‘For here or to go?’
• ‘Cash or card?’

इनका जवाब छोटे, विनम्र वाक्यों में दें: ‘I’d like a sandwich, please.’ या ‘No, that’s all.’

cards.definition:
जब स्टाफ पूछे: ‘क्या लेंगे?’
कहें: ‘I’d like a coffee, please.’

मतलब: ‘कुछ और चाहिए?’
कहें: ‘No, that’s all, thank you.’

यहीं बैठकर खाएँगे या pack करवाएँगे?
कहें: ‘For here, please.’ या ‘To go, please.’

Payment का तरीका?
कहें: ‘I’ll pay by card.’ या ‘I have cash.’

activities.title: Grammar Micro-Explanation
activities.text:
Polite request (विनम्र अनुरोध) वह होता है जहाँ हम शालीनता से कुछ माँगते हैं:

• ‘Could I have...?’ (सबसे polite)
• ‘I’d like...’ (common polite form)
• ‘Can I get...?’ (थोड़ा casual लेकिन acceptable)

Examples:
1) ‘Could I have a sandwich, please?’
2) ‘I’d like a tea, please.’
3) ‘Can I get fries, please?’

cards.term: Could I have a sandwich, please?
cards.definition: जब आप sandwich order करना चाहें, ये बोलें। (Very polite)
Café में पसंद बताने के लिए। (Common polite form)
थोड़ा casual — but still polite with ‘please’।

activities.title: कैसे जवाब दें?
activities.text:
Staff के सवाल:
1) What would you like? → ‘I’d like a sandwich, please.’
2) Anything else? → ‘No, that’s all, thank you.’
3) For here or to go? → ‘For here, please.’ या ‘To go, please.’
4) Cash or card? → ‘I’ll pay by card.’

आपकी tone और smile भी बहुत अहम हैं!

cards.definition: जब आपको कुछ और नहीं चाहिए, ये phrase use करें।
Order में कुछ add करना हो — polite + direct!

activities.title: Menu देखें और Order करें
activities.body:
Imagine the cafe has: Hot tea, Coffee, French fries, Sandwich, Cookies.

Examples:
- I’d like a coffee, please.
- Could I have a sandwich?
- How much is the coffee?

activities.question: Which sentence is more polite if Neha wants a sandwich?
options: Could I have a sandwich, please?

activities.title: Surprise Fact
activities.body: क्या आप जानते हैं? ‘Please’ बोलने से सामने वाले का सहयोग लगभग 40% बढ़ जाता है! Next time, say it clearly: ‘Could I have a chai, please?’

scenes.text:
Neha enters a cafe.
Staff: 'Hello, what would you like?' (Step 1: Greet + Step 2: Order)
Neha: 'Could I have a hot tea and cookies, please?'

Staff: 'Sure. Will you have them here or to go?' (Common Question)
Neha: 'I’ll have them here. Thank you!'

activities.title: Key Learning (Story #1)
activities.body: Notice how Neha first greets, then orders with ‘please.’ यह एक छोटा कदम है पर बड़ा असर करता है!

activities.title: Step 4: Modify Order
activities.text:
मान लीजिए आपने cookies order कीं, पर अब fries चाहते हैं. Politely request to change:
- ‘Sorry, could I change my order?’
- ‘Actually, I’d like fries instead.’

Staff मदद करेगा – बस softly पूछें.

activities.sentence: ________, could I change my order? I'd like fries instead.
hints: Hint (हिंट): छोटा apologize करें और फिर request करें।

feedback.wrongText: Try again. A short apology softens the request.

activities.title: Neha’s Dialogue (Steps 1-4)

messages.text: Staff: Good afternoon! What would you like?
Neha: Could I have a hot tea and cookies, please?
Neha: Actually, I’d like fries instead of cookies, please.
Staff: No problem! Hot tea and fries. That’ll be $6. For here or to go?

activities.learningTakeaway: Use Steps 1–4 to greet, order, respond, and modify politely.

activities.title: Key Learning (Story #2)
activities.body: Neha politely changes her order—notice ‘Actually…’ + ‘please.’ कोई परेशानी नहीं, staff happily helps!

activities.title: Staff Recommendations
activities.text:
कभी-कभी स्टाफ suggest करता है:
- ‘Would you like to try our special pastry?’
- ‘We have fresh cupcakes. Interested?’

हाँ: ‘Yes, I’d love to try that!’
ना: ‘No, thank you.’

Order process का हिस्सा—polite रहना ज़रूरी!

activities.question: Staff: 'We have fresh cupcakes. Would you like one?' How should Neha respond politely?
options: Sure, I’d love one! Thank you.

dynamicFeedback.0: Could be gentler. Try adding ‘please’ or a polite tone.
dynamicFeedback.3: A bit vague. If no, say ‘No, thanks.’

activities.title: Step 5: Confirm & Pay
activities.text:
अक्सर price confirm करना होता है:
- ‘How much is it?’
- ‘Is it card or cash?’

फिर payment के बाद: ‘Thank you!’ और मुस्कुराइए—इतना आसान!

cards.definition: बिल या कीमत पूछने के लिए (Step 5).
जब आप card से पे करना चाहें—‘thanks’ जोड़ें!
Order finalize करने के बाद ‘Thank you’ ज़रूर कहें!

scenes.text:
Neha: ‘How much is it?’
Staff: ‘$6 total. Cash or card?’
Neha: ‘I’ll pay by card, thank you!’

Neha taps her card, receives her food.
**Key Learning:** Confirm the total cost politely, and end with a ‘thank you’ + smile.

activities.title: Recap: 5 Key Takeaways
activities.body:
1) Start with a greeting: ‘Excuse me…’ या ‘Hello!’
2) Use polite requests: ‘Could I have…?’ / ‘I’d like…’
3) Respond to staff: ‘No, that’s all, thank you.’
4) Modify politely: ‘Actually, could I change my order?’
5) Confirm & Pay: ‘How much is it?’ और ‘Thank you!’

activities.prompt: Cafe में बोलिए: ‘Excuse me, could I have a sandwich, please?’ और अपना नाम बताइए—confidence के साथ! Practice aloud and imagine you’re at the counter.

activities.title: Final Tip
activities.body: धीरे बोलिए, मुस्कुराइए, और ‘please’ व ‘thank you’ ज़रूर use करें. अगर भूल जाएँ, तो calmly समझाइए. Staff मदद करेगा—ये 5-Step Toolkit हर जगह काम आता है!

activities.title: Mentor’s Outro
activities.text: बहुत बढ़िया! अब आप आसानी से café या restaurant में confidently order कर सकते हैं. Keep practicing—हर बार 5-step toolkit याद रखें!

activities.title: Reflect & Rehearse
activities.body:
आज का सीख: अगली बार आप कैफ़े में जाएंगे तो कौन-सी English लाइन सबसे पहले बोलेंगे?

एक बार सोचकर ज़ोर से बोलें—visualize your success!

activities.title: Food Ordering Pro!
activities.description: बधाई हो! आपने Neha की कहानी के साथ English ordering सीखा – अब आप दुनिया के किसी भी cafe या counter पर निडरता से ऑर्डर कर सकते हैं. Keep using the 5-Step Toolkit!
